description: Lucas confronts Antonio Vela with the petition and says he will have to move out of the building, but Vela stands firm. He even upgrades to a fourway, this time inviting neighbor Rick Gonzales, black stud Polo McCabe and tattooed cutie David. Together, they create another racket with their mutual cock-sucking and daisy-chain ass-eating. Gonzales tops McCabe and Vela fucks David before they all cream in McCabes mouth.
title: Antonio Vela, David, Polo McCabe and Rick Gonzales
